fly: ^You have two pairs of wings and compound eyes. You can fly fast and sense movement around you. You feed on nectar and rotting organic matter. You have many predators, such as birds and spiders. Your life span is very short.
ant: ^You have thousands of siblings, and one mother. You carry food back to the nest to feed the colonyâ€”leaves, mushrooms, the flesh of the dead, and strange foods that don't grow anywhere but simply appear after some giants have been scented nearby. Whatever you find, you bring. You explore the
^ for long periods in search of food, but not for yourself. No, you barely have the notion of a self. You're an ant. You work tirelessly only for the queen.
Leaf: ^You almost never stop working, and sometimes get very exhausted, but then you remember, you are not the body that carries this leaf. You are a piece of the queen. How can the glorious and flawless queen be defeated? She cannot. And therefore, you shall never falter.
Sugar: ^The queen is the most beautiful thing in the world to you. But a shiny piece of sugar  is not bad either. You can admire it for hours as you carry it back to the colony.

Flood: ^A torrent of water comes over the horizon one day,

s2: ^from the end of a strange plastic snake.

Step: ^A shadow appears over you one day. You look up to see a creature too big to fit within your view. A part of it descends upon you. You think you scream, or try to dodge out of the way. You're not sure, it all happened so quickly
Cordecept: ^You begin to feel funny. Happy? Disoriented? You wobble on your feet. You desire freedom. You want to feel the wind in your antennae, and take in the world from your perch high in the canopy, the root, the top of a fence, anywhere but down here. You drop your burden, isn't it time you took a moment for yourself? Surely, you've earned it. You climb, tirelessly, ignoring the incessant calls of your mates, ignoring the command of your queen. You will be free, you WILL BE FREE! YOU WILL BE FREE! You make it to the top, it is like floating, like soaring on a stream of air, floating in a pool of comfortable numbness. You will rest, you will dream, you will be happy.

bee: ^You are a worker bee in a hive of honey bees. You have a fuzzy body and a stinger. You can make honey from nectar and pollen. You help pollinate flowers and crops. You have a complex social structure and a dance language.
spider: ^You have eight legs and venomous fangs. You can spin silk from your spinnerets and make webs to catch prey. You are an ambush predator and can sense vibrations with your hairs. You have many enemies, such as wasps and birds.
butterfly: ^You have four colorful wings and a long proboscis. You can fly from flower to flower and sip nectar. You are an example of metamorphosis and have four stages in your life cycle: egg, caterpillar, pupa and adult. You have many admirers, but also some dangers, such as lizards and frogs.
dog: ^You are a domesticated canine that lives with humans. You have fur, ears and a tail. You can bark, growl and wag your tail. You are loyal, friendly and playful. You like to chase balls and bones.
cat: ^You are a domesticated feline that lives with humans. You have fur, whiskers and claws. You can meow, purr and hiss. You are independent, curious and graceful. You like to nap and catch mice.
mouse: ^You are a small rodent that lives in various habitats. You have fur, ears and a long tail. You can squeak, nibble and run. You are timid, clever and adaptable. You like to eat seeds and cheese.
lion: ^You are the king of the beasts that lives in the savanna. You have fur, mane and sharp teeth. You can roar, hunt and fight. You are powerful, majestic and brave. You like to eat meat and protect your pride.
elephant: ^You are the largest land animal that lives in the jungle or the desert. You have skin, trunk and tusks. You can trumpet, spray water and lift things. You are intelligent, gentle and social. You like to eat plants and remember things.
shark: ^You are a fearsome predator that lives in the ocean. You have scales, fins and razor-sharp teeth. You can swim, bite and smell blood. You are fast, strong and ruthless. You like to eat fish and seals.
salmon: ^You are a migratory fish that lives in the ocean and the river. You have scales, fins and a streamlined body. You can swim, jump and spawn. You are determined, resilient and tasty. You like to eat plankton and insects.
clownfish: ^You are a colorful fish that lives in the coral reef. You have scales, fins and stripes. You can swim, hide and form symbiosis with anemones. You are cheerful, adventurous and loyal. You like to eat algae and zooplankton.
goldfish: ^You are a domesticated fish that lives in a bowl or a pond. You have scales, fins and a fancy tail. You can swim, blow bubbles and grow big. You are calm, peaceful and forgetful. You like to eat flakes and pellets.
jellyfish: ^You are a simple creature that lives in the ocean. You have no bones, no brain and no heart. You can float, pulse and sting. You are graceful, mysterious and dangerous. You like to eat plankton and small fish.

c-1: ^I am tired, let me rest in oblivion. Spare me the aggravation of unceasing existence.
^You cannot. Your desire for nonexistence binds you to this stream of being.
